theorem putnam_2016_a6
  (p : ℝ → Prop)
  (hp : ∀ c, p c ↔
          ∀ P : Polynomial ℝ, P.degree = 3 →
          (∃ x ∈ Icc 0 1, P.eval x = 0) →
          ∫ x in (0)..1, |P.eval x| ≤ c * (sSup {y | ∃ x ∈ Icc 0 1, y = |P.eval x|})) :

      rw [hp]

      have h₂ : (∫ x in (0)..1, |P.eval x|) ≤ putnam_2016_a6_solution * (sSup {y | ∃ x ∈ Icc 0 1, y = |P.eval x|}) := by
        have h₃ : ∫ x in (0)..1, |P.eval x| ≤ putnam_2016_a6_solution * (sSup {y | ∃ x ∈ Icc 0 1, y = |P.eval x|}) := by

```lean4
theorem putnam_2016_a6
  (p : ℝ → Prop)
  (hp : ∀ c, p c ↔
          ∀ P : Polynomial ℝ, P.degree = 3 →
          (∃ x ∈ Icc 0 1, P.eval x = 0) →
          ∫ x in (0)..1, |P.eval x| ≤ c * (sSup {y | ∃ x ∈ Icc 0 1, y = |P.eval x|})) :
  IsLeast p putnam_2016_a6_solution := by
  have step₁ : IsLeast p putnam_2016_a6_solution := by
    have h₁ : p putnam_2016_a6_solution := by
      rw [hp]
      intro P hP hP'
      have h₁ : (∫ x in (0)..1, |P.eval x|) ≤ putnam_2016_a6_solution * (sSup {y | ∃ x ∈ Icc 0 1, y = |P.eval x|}) := by
        have h₂ : ∫ x in (0)..1, |P.eval x| ≤ putnam_2016_a6_solution * (sSup {y | ∃ x ∈ Icc 0 1, y = |P.eval x|}) := by
          apply le_mul_of_one_le_left (by
            exact?
          )
          simp [putnam_2016_a6_solution]
          <;>
          norm_num
          <;>
          exact?
        simp_all
      simp_all
    have h₂ : ∀ b : ℝ, b < putnam_2016_a6_solution → ¬p b := by
      intro b hb
      rw [hp] at *
      push_neg
      use Polynomial.X ^ 3
      constructor
      · simp [Polynomial.degree_X_pow]
        <;> norm_num
      · intro h
        obtain ⟨x, hx, hx'⟩ := h
        have h₃ := hx'
        have h₄ : x = 0 := by
          norm_num at hx hx'
          <;> aesop
        simp_all [Polynomial.eval_pow, Polynomial.eval_X, h₄]
        <;> norm_num at hb <;> nlinarith [sq_nonneg (b - 1), sq_nonneg (b + 1)]
    exact ⟨h₁, h₂⟩
  
  exact step₁
```

      have h₃ : ∫ x in (0)..1, |P.eval x| ≤ putnam_2016_a6_solution * (sSup {y | ∃ x ∈ Icc 0 1, y = |P.eval x|}) := by
        have h₄ : sSup {y | ∃ x ∈ Icc 0 1, y = |P.eval x|} ≥ ‖P‖ := by
